actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the committee on Rules and Administration to provide legal representation to certain present or former employees on the staff of Senator D'amato.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration to pay out of the Senate's contingent fund, the legal expenses for any present or former employee on the staff of Senator D'Amato for private representation with respect to official actions and responsibilities before the grand jury in United States District Court for the Eastern District of New York.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the committee on Rules and Administration to provide legal representation to certain present or former employees on the staff of Senator D'amato.
